Reviews.Title: great pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Timothy L. Meigs
Reviews.Content: Every setting in this camera works very well.Easy to use . Clear ,bright screen.The dual stabilizer works better than any I've seen. The kids , while spinning in a circle , would snap a picture , and what ever it was pointing at that time, came out very clear , no blurs.I really like the metal body too, just feels like I've got a better made camera.I use the "type H " XD card , and get good speed between shots and on tranfers to the PC.I'm very happy with the pictures themselves . { remember to check your "modes "}.At this price point, I don't know if you can do better.

Reviews.Title: untitled
Reviews.Author: Janet Catalona
Reviews.Content: It's great; never have had a problem; love the video clip aspect.  I think it takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nice Looking, but takes Shabby Pictures
Reviews.Author: kiwikimy
Reviews.Content: This Olympus camera looks really sleek and is great to hold, but the pictures it takes are unnecessarily blurry or dim, even though the camera has 8MP. In super bright sunlight the pictures will be moderately clear, but all-in-all I am really disappointed with the pictures from this camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
Box Contents - FE-280 digital camera, Wrist strap, Manual, USB cable, Audio/Video cable, Olympus Master 2 Software CD-ROM, Li-42B Lithium-Ion rechargeable battery and charger
8.0-Megapixels, up to 3264x2448 SHQ / HQ Still Resolution, 640x480 at 30fps SHQ AVI Motion JPEG Movie with Sound
48MB Internal Memory - We recommend purchasing an optional 2GB xD-Picture Card for practical usage
Up to 10 frames Panorama Modes automatically when using Olympus brand xD-Picture Card
3x Optical Zoom + 4x Digital Zoom Lens 6.3 - 18.9 mm (36 - 108 mm equivalent in 35mm photography) 6 Lenses in 5 Groups, 4 Aspherical Lenses
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus Stylus FE-280 8MP Digital Camera with Dual Image Stabilized 3x Optical Zoom (Blue)
